newsitem.title: UK: Heavy snow causes travel problems in Britain.
newsitem.headline: Heavy snow causes travel problems in Britain.

text.p: Heavy snow blanketed much of Britain on Tuesday with Sussex and Kent labouring under falls of up to 12 cms -- the worst since 1981, meteorologists said.
Roads were blocked in several parts of northern Britain and icy conditions made travel difficult in south-east England, causing dozens of minor accidents.

Weather forecasters said the sub-zero temperatures would continue for another three days and travel organisations warned drivers to make journeys only if necessary. No major problems were reported at airports or on the railways.
